title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message: Compare diode mode readings on the LDOs of all CD3215 chips.

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message:
u3100
PP1V8_UPC_XA_LDOD  0.015
PP3V3_UPC_XA_LDO     0.004
U3200
PP1V8_UPC_XB_LDOD  0.450
PP3V3_UPC_XB_LDO     0.470
UB300

PP3V3_UPC_TA_LDO     0.477
UB400

PP3V3_UPC_TA_LDO     0.470

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message:
820-00928 power on with charger wire power button not responding
Will turn on with charger and battery connected, will run off battery or charger it charges battery however when press power button it will not shut off i tried different button  
if i close lid and open screen does not come back on but keyboard is lit up

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message:
SMC_ONOFF_L drops when you press power button?
If not, use R5226 pads instead.

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message: yes SMC_ONOFF_L drops when i press power button? it drops from 3.3v to 0v but it does not turn on

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message:
No reaction even if you press power button 5s?

Check U5255 I/O signals, when you close/open the lid.

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message:
No reaction even if i press power button 5s
smc_lid is 3.3v open and 0v close the fans stop after i close and start when i open no screen turns on

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message: screen come on but no back light the battery says service so im going to try another screen and battery  but no power button

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message:
What about SMC_LID_LEFT/RIGHT signals?
Just one high is good enough for U5255, but SMC receives the 3 signals.

If SMC_ONOFF_L stays low 4s, SMC should turn off the machine.

title: 820-00928 one of the 4 usb-c no 5v
message: i tried 3 screens they light up when i close the lid and open i can see video but no back light the video works on external monitor
